headline.main: U.S. TECHNICAL CORPS ON JOB IN ENGLAND; Civilian Radiolocator Men Are Under R.A.F. Discipline

lead_paragraph: AN ENGLISH SOUTH COAST TOWN, Oct. 4 (AP) -- The first group of American members of Britain's new Civilian Technical Corps to work on the radiolocator have arrived in England and found themselves subject to military discipline, even though they are carefully classified as civilians on their United States passport.

keywords.name: persons
keywords.value: JOUBERT DE LA FERTE , PHILIP BENNET
